71057.「さすがは <cs_pchero>さま。\n この場から 邪悪な気を感じましたが:
As I thought. I sensed an evil presence
lurking here, but it appears you've already
taken care of it.

71058.「……世告げの姫として目覚めた時\n 私は ひとりで ここに立っていました。:
When I awoke as a Princess of Prophecy, I
stood in this place alone...

71062.「故郷を滅ぼされ 悲しいか？: Sad to see your home destroyed?

71063.「死の恐怖から 逃げ惑うだけの生活にも\n 疲れただろう。今すぐ 楽にしてやる…:
It must be exhausting to live a life with a
constant fear of death. I'll make this quick
and easy for you...

71065.「……コゼット。\n あ…あなたを守れ…なくて ごめ…ん…なさい。\n 私も…す:
Cosette... I'm... I'm sorry that I couldn't...
protect you... I'll...be with you soon...

71071.「ボク……帰らなくちゃいけなくて……。\n だけど 追いだされてしまったから\n:
I... I have to go home...but I was cast out,
so I can't go back by myself...

71073.「おねえちゃん ボクといっしょに\n 帰ってくれないかな。おねえちゃんと\n い:
Hey, miss...do you think you could come with
me? If you're there with me, then I'm sure
I'll be able to go home.

71074.「そしたら ボク…… おねえちゃんの頼み\n どんなことでも きいてあげるから！: I'll...I'll do anything that you ask of me!

71077.「クックック……。見つけたぞ。\n まさか こんな所に隠れていたとはな。:
Keh heh heh...found you. Never would
have guessed you'd be hiding in a place like
this.

71078.「だが もう 逃げられん。\n すぐに 妹の後を追わせてやろう。:
There's nowhere left to run. You'll be joining
that girl very soon.

71079.「私は 死ん…でもいい……。\n でも…もし かなう…の…なら……\n コ コゼ:
It's okay...if I die...but...if I can...
just hold...Cosette in...my arms...

71080.「大丈夫だよ。\n おねえちゃんの願い ちゃんと わかるよ。\n じゃあ……すこ:
It's okay. I understand what it is that you
want. I just need you to wait a moment.

71085.「これで ボクといっしょに帰ってくれるよね？: You'll come with me now, right?

71089.「私を 世告げの姫として動かしていた者……。\n 彼の者の思惑も すべて……。:
The one who pushed me to become a Princess of
Prophecy...and all of his intentions...

71090.「先ほど <cs_pchero>さまが倒された魔物は\n コゼットの命を奪った:
The monsters that you defeated must have been
my fears made real. The fear of those pursuers
who took Cosette's life.

71091.「<cs_pchero>さま……。\n ここまで来られたのも あなたのおかげです:
It's all thanks to you that we've been able to
come this far, <cs_pchero>...
Please accept this as my thanks.

71092.「<cs_pchero>さま。\n のちほど 落陽の草原にいる\n コゼットのも:
Please visit Cosette in the Sunset Meadow when
you can.

71095.「コゼット……。\n あの子が 呪縛から解かれる日は\n いつ 訪れるのでしょう:
Cosette... I wonder if the day will ever come
when she is finally free from her curse...
